introduction about microarrays

freaking machine

related to the

try to understand what is

one gene at a time forever.

What is changed in modern
functional genomics is the introduction

different change in this.

There is an intellectual

interesting consequence.

One-- one is cool. One, I can look
everything in action. I can try to be
surprised by my results.

spending two years seeing

if a particular gene is

What are the most
